attributes.action: Manifesto pledges that are broken should trigger a general election
attributes.additional_details: Because it is your duty to serve us, tell the truth, get elected honestly and lead our country with dignity. All dignity and competence has been eradicated from our current government and it’s hard working British people that pay the price.
attributes.background: You cannot promise and pledge certain things and then go back on them once in power. For example, no tax rises, not backing compensation for waspi women, allowing the illegal migrant crisis to get out of control. The list goes on and on.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action:

Require election & manifesto pledges to be implemented and legally enforced 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/724417
